Title: High Life
Genre: Adventure, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Claire Denis, Jean-Pol Fargeau, Geoff Cox (collaboration), Andrew Litvack (additional writing), Nick Laird (additional writing by)
Actors: Robert Pattinson, Juliette Binoche, André 3000, Mia Goth
Plot: A father and his daughter struggle to survive in deep space where they live in isolation.
Production: Pandora Filmproduktion, arte France Cinéma, A24, Andrew Lauren Productions, Arte, Alcatraz Films, BFI Film Fund, Madants
